channel.title: How to compare datetime in Rule
channel.description: Hello, I want to compare trigger's datetime with current time in rules. For expample, some action will only execute on work time, which means trigger time should between 9:00 and 18:00, Monday - Friday. I can't find any jinja example `timediff_lt` or `timediff_gt` in example pack. Any suggestions?

item.title: How to compare datetime in Rule
item.dc:creator: Bryan
item.description:
Hello,
I want to compare trigger’s datetime with current time in rules.
For expample, some action will only execute on work time, which means trigger time should between 9:00 and 18:00, Monday - Friday.
I can’t find any jinja example timediff_lt or timediff_gt in example pack.
Any suggestions?

Read full topic
item.source: How to compare datetime in Rule
